word: This work can be accomplished only through faith in Christ, by the power of the indwelling Spirit of God. . . . The Christian will feel the promptings of sin, but will maintain a constant warfare against it. Here is where Christ\92s help is needed. Human weakness becomes united to divine strength, and faith exclaims: \93Thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ\94 (1 Corinthians 15:57).
